snippet: Long, complicated sentences can be off-putting to hurried readers. What’s more, overstuffed sentences are far more likely to run off the grammatical rails. Here are a few recent examples that could have been broken up.
abstract: Long, complicated sentences can be off-putting to hurried readers. What’s more, overstuffed sentences are far more likely to run off the grammatical rails. Here are a few recent examples that could have been broken up.
